DOC.brief_title: Study Pain Control With Hormonal IUS Insertion
DOC.detailed_description: Intrauterine system ( IUS ) among effective form reversible contraception . Numerous study demonstrate safety efficacy . Despite , uptake IUSs among U.S. young woman age 14 22 year low . Increasing use effective , long act contraception among young woman important public health goal , could help reduce high rate unintended pregnancy population . A major barrier young woman 's utilization IUSs fear pain insertion . Unfortunately , study evaluate method pain control IUS insertion focus adult woman , leave question unanswered best pain management method young woman . Compared adult woman , young woman less experience pelvic exam may therefore derive great benefit pain control measure gynecologic procedure , IUS insertion . Young woman provider seek effective pain control option ; yet , lack high quality , comparative effectiveness research guide decision making . This proposal seek fill important gap . With introduction Skyla IUS ( Bayer Healthcare Pharmaceuticals , Inc. ) U.S. market January 2013 , new approach pain management become possible . Skyla small exist IUSs may therefore cause less pain insertion . The pain response trigger Skyla insertion may better control exist pain control option . This underlie premise study . In addition size IUS , theoretical empirical data suggest paracervical block great promise pain control IUS insertion compare pain control option . Paracervical infiltration local anesthetic cervix interrupt visceral sensory fiber low uterus , cervix , upper vagina . Data several clinical trial indicate paracervical block provide clinically significant control pain multiple type gynecologic procedure . One recently publish study evaluate effectiveness paracervical block IUS insertion find marginally significant reduction pain , study underpowered focused adult woman . The value paracervical block young woman receive IUS remain unclear . The investigator propose conduct randomize , control single-blind trial compare pain Skyla IUS insertion among young woman age 14 22 year randomize receive paracervical block versus sham cervical block . This study provide important information counsel young woman pain management IUS insertion .
DOC.criteria: Nulliparous ( i.e. , pregnancy > 24 week ) Not currently pregnant Not pregnant past 6 week Willing randomized paracervical nerve block sham paracervical block group Interested use intrauterine system ( IUS ) Able read provide write informed consent English An allergy , hypersensitivity , absolute medical contraindication use lidocaine , aminoamide local anesthetic , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent , ibuprofen A history epilepsy peptic ulcer disease Moderate severe asthma precludes nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAID ) use Hepatic renal failure Moderate severe cardiac disease Previous use IUS history prior fail IUS insertion Use narcotic benzodiazepine past 24 hour Positive pregnancy test reasonable risk pregnancy Current cervicitis Intrauterine infection past 90 day Meet Centers Disease Control Medical Eligibility Criteria ( MEC ) category 3 4 classification IUS use Currently breastfeed
